--mbx-tabviewer-inactive-background-ligh.description: TabViewer inactive tab background when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `off'

--mbx-tabviewer-inactive-background-dark.description: TabViewer inactive tab background when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `on'

--mbx-tabviewer-inactive-text-light.description: TabViewer inactive tab text color when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `off'

--mbx-tabviewer-inactive-text-dark.description: TabViewer inactive tab text color when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `on'

--mbx-tabviewer-inactive-background-hove.description: TabViewer inactive tab background when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `off', on [hover](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#hover)

TabViewer inactive tab background when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `on', on [hover](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#hover)

--mbx-tabviewer-inactive-text-hover-ligh.description: TabViewer inactive tab text color when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `off', on [hover](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#hover)

--mbx-tabviewer-inactive-text-hover-dark.description: TabViewer inactive tab text color when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `on', on [hover](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#hover)
